# General Requirements Checklist: Hackathon Project

**Purpose**: Validate the quality, completeness, and clarity of requirements for the Hackathon project
**Created**: 2025-12-18
**Feature**: General project requirements

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/sp.checklist` command based on general project context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 - Are all functional requirements explicitly defined and traceable? [Completeness, Gap]
- [ ] CHK002 - Are non-functional requirements (performance, security, scalability) specified? [Completeness, Gap]
- [ ] CHK003 - Are acceptance criteria defined for each requirement? [Completeness, Gap]
- [ ] CHK004 - Are error handling and edge case requirements documented? [Completeness, Gap]
- [ ] CHK005 - Are system dependencies and external interfaces clearly specified? [Completeness, Gap]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK006 - Are all requirements written in unambiguous language without jargon? [Clarity, Gap]
- [ ] CHK007 - Are quantitative terms (e.g., "fast", "high", "low") defined with specific metrics? [Clarity, Gap]
- [ ] CHK008 - Are all acronyms and technical terms defined in a glossary? [Clarity, Gap]
- [ ] CHK009 - Are user roles and permissions clearly defined? [Clarity, Gap]
- [ ] CHK010 - Are all conditional statements (if/then, when/then) properly specified? [Clarity, Gap]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK011 - Are there conflicts between functional and non-functional requirements? [Consistency, Gap]
- [ ] CHK012 - Are requirements consistent across all user stories and use cases? [Consistency, Gap]
- [ ] CHK013 - Are UI/UX requirements consistent with accessibility standards? [Consistency, Gap]
- [ ] CHK014 - Are security requirements aligned with compliance standards? [Consistency, Gap]
- [ ] CHK015 - Are data requirements consistent across all modules? [Consistency, Gap]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK016 - Are acceptance criteria measurable and testable? [Measurability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK017 - Can acceptance criteria be objectively verified? [Measurability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK018 - Are pass/fail conditions clearly defined for each requirement? [Measurability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK019 - Are automated testing requirements specified where applicable? [Measurability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK020 - Are performance benchmarks quantified with specific targets? [Measurability, Gap]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK021 - Are primary user journey requirements fully specified? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK022 - Are alternate flow requirements documented? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK023 - Are exception/error flow requirements defined? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK024 - Are recovery scenarios covered in requirements? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK025 - Are concurrent user interaction scenarios addressed? [Coverage, Gap]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK026 - Are requirements defined for zero-state scenarios (empty data)? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK027 - Are network failure scenarios addressed in requirements? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK028 - Are data validation failure requirements specified? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK029 - Are concurrent access scenarios covered? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK030 - Are system resource limitation scenarios addressed? [Edge Case, Gap]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK031 - Are security requirements defined for authentication and authorization? [NFR, Gap]
- [ ] CHK032 - Are privacy and data protection requirements specified? [NFR, Gap]
- [ ] CHK033 - Are accessibility requirements defined for users with disabilities? [NFR, Gap]
- [ ] CHK034 - Are internationalization/localization requirements specified? [NFR, Gap]
- [ ] CHK035 - Are backup and recovery requirements documented? [NFR, Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK036 - Are all external service dependencies documented? [Dependencies, Gap]
- [ ] CHK037 - Are assumptions about external services validated? [Assumptions, Gap]
- [ ] CHK038 - Are third-party library licensing requirements addressed? [Dependencies, Gap]
- [ ] CHK039 - Are hardware/infrastructure requirements specified? [Dependencies, Gap]
- [ ] CHK040 - Are integration points with existing systems defined? [Dependencies, Gap]

## Ambiguities & Conflicts

- [ ] CHK041 - Are there any ambiguous terms that need clarification? [Ambiguity, Gap]
- [ ] CHK042 - Are there conflicting requirements between different stakeholders? [Conflict, Gap]
- [ ] CHK043 - Are there hidden assumptions that need to be validated? [Assumption, Gap]
- [ ] CHK044 - Are there requirements that contradict technical constraints? [Conflict, Gap]
- [ ] CHK045 - Are there undefined business rules that need clarification? [Ambiguity, Gap]

## Traceability Requirements

- [ ] CHK046 - Is a requirement ID scheme established for tracking? [Traceability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK047 - Are requirements linked to corresponding test cases? [Traceability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK048 - Are design decisions traceable to specific requirements? [Traceability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK049 - Are requirements mapped to business objectives? [Traceability, Gap]
- [ ] CHK050 - Is there a change control process for requirements? [Traceability, Gap]

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
